name: To Valhalla
description:
In every book lies the potential for a small world, within reach of the reader... all they have to do is lose themselves.

In this chapter, Ragnarok is soon to be upon us… will the brave vikings earn passage to Valhalla before the inevitable destruction of the world? Collect the lands treasure and the way will be open to you.

Created for Ludum Dare 38 by George, Mike, Hannah and Paul - sound is recommended!
